trans-unit.source: Typically, component information does not change for the life of a process.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, informações de componente não serão alteradas durante a vida útil de um processo.

trans-unit.source: During design time, however, you can change the component's properties or events.
trans-unit.target: Durante o tempo de design, no entanto, você pode alterar propriedades ou eventos do componente.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the component's information in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> becomes out-of-date, and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, informações do componente <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>torna-se desatualizados e um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>é gerado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event is also raised when a <xref:System.Type> is changed during design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>também o evento é gerado quando um <xref:System.Type>é alterado durante o tempo de design.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>

trans-unit.source: A RefreshEventArgs object specifies the data associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event; that is, the component and the type of component that changed.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto RefreshEventArgs Especifica os dados associados a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>evento; ou seja, o componente e o tipo de componente que foram alteradas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>

trans-unit.source: The RefreshEventArgs class provides <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.ComponentChanged%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.TypeChanged%2A> properties to get the component or type that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe RefreshEventArgs <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.ComponentChanged%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.TypeChanged%2A>Propriedades para obter o componente ou digite que geraram o evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.TypeChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.ComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"></xref> class with the component that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o componente que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"></xref> class with the type of component that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o tipo de componente que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that changed its properties, events, or extenders.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente que alterou suas propriedades, eventos ou extensores.

trans-unit.source: The component that changed its properties, events, or extenders, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if all components of the same type have changed.
trans-unit.target: O componente que alterou suas propriedades, eventos ou extensores, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se todos os componentes do mesmo tipo foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> that changed its properties or events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Type>que alterar suas propriedades ou eventos.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that changed its properties or events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>que alterar suas propriedades ou eventos.</xref:System.Type>
